MASTER_PAD_VERSION_INFO.MASTER_PAD_INFO: Portable Application Description, or PAD for short, is a data set that is used by shareware authors to disseminate information to anyone interested in their software products. To find out more go to http://pad.asp-software.org

English.Keywords: gmail notifier multiple account windows taskbar system tray superbar thumbnail preview toast
English.Char_Desc_45: Monitor multiple Gmail / Google Apps accounts
English.Char_Desc_80: Gmail Notifier Plus monitors multiple Gmail / GApps accounts from your taskbar.
English.Char_Desc_250: Gmail Notifier Plus is an application to monitor multiple Gmail and Google Apps Mail accounts from a single point. Gmail Notifier Plus notifies you of your new mail, and allows you to quickly navigate old and new mail without opening a browser.
English.Char_Desc_450: Gmail Notifier Plus is a small, fun application to monitor multiple Gmail and Google Apps Mail accounts from a single, compact point. With it's slick, native look, Gmail Notifier Plus notifies you in a variety of ways of your new mail, and allows you to quickly navigate old and new mail without opening a browser.
English.Char_Desc_2000: Gmail Notifier Plus is a small, fun application to monitor multiple Gmail and Google Apps Mail accounts from a single, compact point. With it's slick, native look, Gmail Notifier Plus notifies you in a variety of ways of your new mail, and allows you to quickly navigate old and new mail without opening a browser.
